resources.string: Enter Custom Message (Note: this will override note written in setup)
Enter Default Message Here. (Ex: Hi, Please Leave a Review for My Business!)
► If you have multiple business locations, open the location you would like to manage.
► In the menu on the left, click Home.
► In the “Get more reviews” card, copy your short URL and paste it in the setup screen.
► Sign in to your Facebook Business Page.
► Once signed in click “More Tools” on the left side of the screen, followed by “View Page”
► From here you can click “Reviews” on the left side of the screen and copy the URL that loads
► If you do not have a Facebook business page, you can create one from your personal Facebook account
► Underneath your profile picture you will see an "@" username for your page
► Your username is everything after the "@" symbol
► Navigate to your Yelp business page any browser as if you were a customer
► If you have not created a Yelp business page, you can sign up for one here
► Once you are on your Yelp page, copy the URL that is displayed in the browser\'s address bar
► An example of a Yelp page link is the following: https://www.yelp.com/biz/your-business-name-here
How To Get Your Business Review Links
Enter Default Reminder Message Here:\n(Ex: Hi, just a reminder to leave a review for my business.)
